description: F4: 인수 테스트 생성 고정 응답

message.content: {"acceptanceTests":[{"title":"Successful login with valid credentials","givenClause":"A registered user with valid email and password","whenClause":"The user submits the login form with correct credentials","thenClause":"The user is redirected to the dashboard and session is created"},{"title":"Failed login with invalid credentials","givenClause":"A user with an incorrect password","whenClause":"The user submits the login form with wrong credentials","thenClause":"An error message is displayed and no session is created"}]}
